metadata.title: CVE-2020-19497 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow vulnerability in Mat_VarReadNextInfo5 in mat5.c in tbeu matio (aka MAT File I/O Library) 1.5.17, allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service or possibly other unspecified impacts.

criterions.comment: libmatio package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
